text: puokke( poutatbot) niyeay tha brasenbae puok yeung ban vil towkean mea di nah vinh anak khlang pitchea nung b ne d nh anak tnkhsaaoy chenhpi tinoh khn del pheap khlangpouke chea kamm se ti th robsa a l laoh ning anakneasar robsa trong promteang chea kammosetthi robsa banda anak del mean chomnue bonnaoh . bo nde puok poutatbot mindoeng laey
